value.title: Power BI Tips & Tricks #12: Build your own KPI indicators in Power BI

Download the example here: http://gofile.me/2kEOD/EF1ClILcC Northwind data source: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k3NMIlLffrU Icons: https://www.iconfinder.com/  Keynotes: - Current KPI visuals in Power BI 00:13 - Build the KPI

value.title: Refresh Power BI every second or minute!
value.excerpt: In today's video I am going to show you how to refresh Power BI every minute or any interval you yet :). As with everything, there are some limitations but it doesnt require a premium license.  #curbal #powerbi  Link to the blog post: https://bigintsolutions.com/2019/03/29/refresh-power-bi-report-every-min-and-show-on-a-tv/

value.title: Reverse cummulative values in Power Query
value.excerpt: I have shown you previously how you can reverse cummulated data using DAX, but I never showed you how to do it in Power Query, so here it is!   Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center Want the pbix file? Get download number 68 on the community downloads folder.

value.title: Store data from PowerApps in sql, approve it in flow and use it in Power bI
value.excerpt: In today's video we will create a PowerApp that will store stopwords in a SQL table on an on-prem server. The PowerApp will log the user of the app and a timestamp. value.title: Easily get an access token for the Power BI Embedded Playground
